entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Temperature rising to 14 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then clearing. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 40 km/h becoming southwest 20 early this evening then light near midnight. Temperature rising to 14 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
